info.title: Flow API
info.description:
# Flow API v1.0.0

## Overview
Flow API is a comprehensive habit tracking and personal development platform backend service. It provides secure, scalable endpoints for managing user flows, entries, activities, and synchronization across multiple devices.

## Key Features
- üîê **Firebase Authentication Integration** - Secure JWT-based authentication
- üìä **Flow Management** - Create, track, and manage personal habits and goals
- üìù **Entry Tracking** - Log daily progress with quantitative and qualitative data
- üìà **Analytics & Insights** - Comprehensive activity statistics and progress tracking
- üîÑ **Offline Sync** - Robust offline-to-online synchronization system
- ‚öôÔ∏è **User Settings** - Customizable preferences and privacy controls
- üè• **Health Monitoring** - Real-time service health and performance metrics

## Security
- Bearer token authentication (JWT)
- Rate limiting (100 requests/minute)
- Input validation and sanitization
- CORS protection
- SQL injection prevention
- XSS protection

## Rate Limits
- **General API**: 100 requests per minute per IP
- **Authentication**: 10 requests per minute per IP
- **Sync Operations**: 50 requests per minute per user

## Support
For API support, please contact our development team or refer to the documentation.
